issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.summary: Cannot run my app on Android Emulator

comments.body:
Just a bit of extra info:

I'm using Titanium build 4.0.0.201505202026 on with Android SDK 5.0.1 API 21.

I can send a zip of the sandbox file that I have seen the problem on so that you can replicate.

Hi ,
can you please send us the result of executing this in the command line?
{code}
appc ti config
appc ti info
{code}

Ensure that you have Latest version(0.10.37) Node.JS installed. 

Thanks
